response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which holds immense value to both us and you, amounting to $1,000,000. Considering its unique features and the impact it could have on your endeavors, we are extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
